scopes.name: preamble
scopes.explanation: The preamble is defined as the beginning of the contract up to the start of the standard preprint, which typically begins with '1. Applicability'. Here, line 9 is the start of '1. Applicability', so the preamble is lines 0 through 8.

scopes.name: annex 1
scopes.explanation: Annex 1 is clearly marked starting at line 280 ('ANNEX 1') and continues through the supplemental terms and conditions, ending just before 'ANNEX II' at line 405. Thus, lines 280-404 comprise Annex 1.
